## CIP30Interface interface

CIP-30 Wallet interface.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface CIP30Interface 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[getBalance()](./wallet.cip30interface.getbalance.md)


</td><td>

Retrieves the total available balance of the wallet, encoded in CBOR.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getChangeAddress()](./wallet.cip30interface.getchangeaddress.md)


</td><td>

Retrieves an address owned by the wallet which should be used to return transaction change.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getCollateral()](./wallet.cip30interface.getcollateral.md)


</td><td>

Retrieves all collateral UTXOs owned by the wallet.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getNetworkId()](./wallet.cip30interface.getnetworkid.md)


</td><td>

Retrieves the network ID of the currently connected account.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getRewardAddresses()](./wallet.cip30interface.getrewardaddresses.md)


</td><td>

Retrieves all reward addresses owned by the wallet.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getUnusedAddresses()](./wallet.cip30interface.getunusedaddresses.md)


</td><td>

Retrieves all unused addresses controlled by the wallet.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getUsedAddresses()](./wallet.cip30interface.getusedaddresses.md)


</td><td>

Retrieves all used addresses controlled by the wallet.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getUtxos()](./wallet.cip30interface.getutxos.md)


</td><td>

Retrieves the unspent transaction outputs (UTXOs) controlled by the wallet.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[signData(address, payload)](./wallet.cip30interface.signdata.md)


</td><td>

Request's a user's signature for a given payload conforming to the \[CIP-0008 signing spec\](https://github.com/cardano-foundation/CIPs/blob/master/CIP-0008/README.md)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[signTx(tx, partialSign)](./wallet.cip30interface.signtx.md)


</td><td>

Requests a user's signature for the unsigned portions of a transaction.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[submitTx(tx)](./wallet.cip30interface.submittx.md)


</td><td>

Submits a signed transaction to the network.


</td></tr>
